title: Blood Rite
description:
Julian has a problem. Or four. His enemy's daughter needs protection. And she's a witch. And he can't keep his hands and eyes off her. And neither can his best friend.
Julian thought he'd rid the world of Sebastian, but a warning from a long ago dead soul makes Julian realize his worst fear will be realized: Not only is Sebastian back, but the witch's council needs Julian to protect Sebastian's daughter, Addison. She's beautiful, stubborn, and a worst of all, a witch--the very thing the four-hundred-year-old vampire hates most of all.It doesn't help that his best friend Andre is not only determined to win her for himself, but is also positive the three of them can actually make a relationship work. That's provided, of course, they all survive and that Julian can get past Addison's magical abilities.Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual situations and includes anal play/intercourse, menage (m/f/m with homoerotic content), and violence.
author: Trista Ann Michaels
